com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face

Class FaceData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData

  • public class FaceData
extends java.lang.Object
    Face objects are used to store the facial data elements returned by the facial processing engine. These data elements include:
    • Gaze Point
    • Horizontal Gaze Angle
    • Vertical Gaze Angle
    • Left Eye Blink
    • Right Eye Blink
    • Face Pitch
    • Face Roll
    • Face Yaw
    • Smile Value
    • Recognition Confidence Value
    • Person ID
    Facial data elements can only be extracted via the exposed FaceData methods. The following facial data coordinates are public and can be extracted directly from the Face object:
    • leftEye
    • rightEye
    • mouth
    • rect
    The constructor for this object is called from the FacialProcessing.getFaceData method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Point leftEye
      The X,Y coordinates of the center of the left eye in relation to the resolution of the raw image data
      Point mouth
      The X,Y coordinates of the center of the mouth in relation to the resolution of the raw image data
      Rect rect
      The X,Y coordinates of the rectangle bounding the detected face in relation to the resolution of the raw image data
      Point rightEye
      The X,Y coordinates of the center of the right eye in relation to the resolution of the raw image data

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PointF getEyeGazePoint()
      Returns the gaze point the eyes are looking toward in relation to the position of the camera.
      int getEyeHorizontalGazeAngle()
      Returns the horizontal gaze angle value.
      int getEyeVerticalGazeAngle()
      Returns the vertical gaze angle value.
      int getLeftEyeBlink()
      Returns the left eye blink value for the detected face.
      int getPersonId()
      This API returns the personID for the face in the recognition album that matches the input face from the processed frame or bitmap.
      int getPitch()
      This API returns the value of how much a detected face is looking up/down
      int getRecognitionConfidence()
      This API returns a value representing how confident the face engine software is, that the input face matches the face data of a person in the recognition album.
      int getRightEyeBlink()
      Returns the right eye blink value for the detected face.
      int getRoll()
      This API returns the value of how much a detected face has been tilted.
      int getSmileValue()
      Returns the smile value for the detected face.
      int getYaw()
      This API returns the value of how much a detected face is looking left/right.

    • Field Detail

      • leftEye

        public Point leftEye
        The X,Y coordinates of the center of the left eye in relation to the resolution of the raw image data

      • rightEye

        public Point rightEye
        The X,Y coordinates of the center of the right eye in relation to the resolution of the raw image data

      • mouth

        public Point mouth
        The X,Y coordinates of the center of the mouth in relation to the resolution of the raw image data

      • rect

        public Rect rect
        The X,Y coordinates of the rectangle bounding the detected face in relation to the resolution of the raw image data

    • Method Detail

      • getSmileValue

        public int getSmileValue()
        Returns the smile value for the detected face. The smile value range is 0 to 100. The lower the value, the less likely it is that the face is smiling. There is no negative value for frown detection.
        Returns:
        smileDegree The smileDegree variable is of type integer.

      • getLeftEyeBlink

        public int getLeftEyeBlink()
        Returns the left eye blink value for the detected face. The blink value range is 0 to 100. The lower the value, the less likely it is that the eye is blinking.
        Returns:
        lEyeBlink The lEyeBlink variable is of type integer.

      • getRightEyeBlink

        public int getRightEyeBlink()
        Returns the right eye blink value for the detected face. The blink value range is 0 to 100. The lower the value, the less likely it is that the eye is blinking.
        Returns:
        rEyeBlink The rEyeBlink variable is of type integer.

      • getEyeHorizontalGazeAngle

        public int getEyeHorizontalGazeAngle()
        Returns the horizontal gaze angle value. The value range is -30 to 30. A negative value indicates the eyes are looking to the left of the camera. A value of 0 indices the eyes are looking directly at the camera in the horizontal plane. A positive value indicates the eyes are looking to the right of the camera.
        Returns:
        eyeHorizontalGazeAngle The eyeHorizontalGazeAngle variable is of type integer.

      • getEyeVerticalGazeAngle

        public int getEyeVerticalGazeAngle()
        Returns the vertical gaze angle value. The value range is -20 to 20. A negative value indicates the eyes are looking below the camera. A value of 0 indicates the eyes are looking directly at the camera in the vertical plane. A positive value indicates the eyes are looking above to the camera.
        Returns:
        eyeVerticalGazeAngle The eyeVerticalGazeAngle variable is of type integer.

      • getEyeGazePoint

        public PointF getEyeGazePoint()
        Returns the gaze point the eyes are looking toward in relation to the position of the camera. The value of the gaze point ranges from -1 to 1, expressed to the hundredth decimal place. The point values represent an X,Y coordinate where 0,0 represents the center of the eye in a two dimensional plane.
        Returns:
        PointF Returns the X,Y gaze coordinate expressed as a floating point value

      • getYaw

        public int getYaw()
        This API returns the value of how much a detected face is looking left/right. Factors in the mirrored state of the camera but any use of this value needs to factor in any display orientation rotation degrees of the camera manually.
        Returns:
        value representing how much a face is looking left/right on scale of -180 to 179

      • getRoll

        public int getRoll()
        This API returns the value of how much a detected face has been tilted. Factors in the mirrored state of the camera but any use of this value needs to factor in any display orientation rotation degrees of the camera manually.
        Returns:
        value representing how much a face has been tilted on scale of -180 to 179

      • getPitch

        public int getPitch()
        This API returns the value of how much a detected face is looking up/down
        Returns:
        value representing how much a face is looking up/down on scale of -180 to 179

      • getPersonId

        public int getPersonId()
        This API returns the personID for the face in the recognition album that matches the input face from the processed frame or bitmap. The personID is a unique identifying number assigned to each person added to the recognition album.
        Returns:
        personID or FacialProcessingConstants.NOT_FOUND(-111) if there is no match

      • getRecognitionConfidence

        public int getRecognitionConfidence()
        This API returns a value representing how confident the face engine software is, that the input face matches the face data of a person in the recognition album. The value will range from 0 to 100. The lower the value, the less confident the software is that the faces match.
        Returns:
        recognitionConfidenceValue or FacialProcessingConstants.NOT_FOUND(-111) if there is no match
